docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Every baby born in New York State will be tested for syphilis at birth, starting tomorrow, because of a sharp surge in the disease among newborns in recent years, the State Health Department said yesterday.

headline.main: New York Sees a Surge in Syphilis And Will Start Testing All Babies

docs.snippet: LEAD: Every baby born in New York State will be tested for syphilis at birth, starting tomorrow, because of a sharp surge in the disease among newborns in recent years, the State Health Department said yesterday.
